channel.title: PHP Code Tags?
channel.description:
I think these forums should have a code tag with a bit more syntax.
People could use it to of course post PHP code, but it also makes SCAR code, and stuff look a lot cleaner! At SRL everyone posts there code in SRL tags, because it looks a lot cleaner, and more readable than regular Code tags. We had SCAR tags back at kaitnieks, but I imagine those would be hard to duplicate, so PHP code tags would be fine.
I know people think it may be useless, but I think it looks a lot cleaner, and I'm sure others agree with it.
Thanks, Cheesehunk.

item.title: PHP Code Tags?
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

I think these forums should have a code tag with a bit more syntax.

People could use it to of course post PHP code, but it also makes SCAR code, and stuff look a lot cleaner! At SRL everyone posts there code in SRL tags, because it looks a lot cleaner, and more readable than regular Code tags. We had SCAR tags back at kaitnieks, but I imagine those would be hard to duplicate, so PHP code tags would be fine.

I know people think it may be useless, but I think it looks a lot cleaner, and I'm sure others agree with it.

Thanks,
Cheesehunk.
